title: Apple unveils new Pride Edition bands for Apple Watch: Price, availability
content_html: Every year in Pride Month, Apple unveils new bands and watch faces in support of the global LGBTQ+ community and equality movement. This year’s Pride Edition Sport Loop showcases a colour gradient with the word “pride” woven directly into the band. There’s also a Pride Edition Nike Sport Loop that has been unveiled by Apple.
summary: Every year in Pride Month, Apple unveils new bands and watch faces in support of the global LGBTQ+ community and equality movement. This year’s Pride Edition Sport Loop showcases a colour gradient with the word “pride” woven directly into the band. There’s also a Pride Edition Nike Sport Loop that has been unveiled by Apple.

title: Google Chrome will soon allow Android users to remove the Discover feed from New Tab Page
content_html: Google Chrome’s New Tab Page on the desktop is far cleaner than the Android version. Some additional cards appear below the page on desktop, however, it mainly focuses on the shortcuts and search. Users can also keep an eye out for an upcoming flag if they want more simplicity in their web browser.
summary: Google Chrome’s New Tab Page on the desktop is far cleaner than the Android version. Some additional cards appear below the page on desktop, however, it mainly focuses on the shortcuts and search. Users can also keep an eye out for an upcoming flag if they want more simplicity in their web browser.

title: How to build India’s cyber resilience: Identify, investigate and report
content_html: "An integrated security approach, cybersecurity skilling and collaboration between the public and private sectors for analysis and sharing of threat intelligence will be foundational to defend India at scale," was the key thought that came from Microsoft virtual media roundtable on cybercrime and cybersecurity.
summary: "An integrated security approach, cybersecurity skilling and collaboration between the public and private sectors for analysis and sharing of threat intelligence will be foundational to defend India at scale," was the key thought that came from Microsoft virtual media roundtable on cybercrime and cybersecurity.

title: Google unveils new portable camera, smartphone update for Maps’ Street View feature
content_html: Google Maps’ Street View is celebrating its 15th anniversary and on the occasion, Google has introduced two new upgrades to the feature.
summary: Google Maps’ Street View is celebrating its 15th anniversary and on the occasion, Google has introduced two new upgrades to the feature.

title: Apex Legends guide: Know the legends and find the best character for your gameplay
Explained: What is the Predator spyware and why is Google warning Android smartphone users about it
content_html: This malicious spyware is capable of recording audio, adding CA certificates, and even hiding apps. The Predator spyware was sold to government-backed threat actors in Egypt, Armenia, Greece, Madagascar, Côte d’Ivoire, Serbia, Spain and Indonesia where it was used covertly to spy on high-value targets like political rivals, journalists and other outspoken critics of their respective governments.
summary: This malicious spyware is capable of recording audio, adding CA certificates, and even hiding apps. The Predator spyware was sold to government-backed threat actors in Egypt, Armenia, Greece, Madagascar, Côte d’Ivoire, Serbia, Spain and Indonesia where it was used covertly to spy on high-value targets like political rivals, journalists and other outspoken critics of their respective governments.

title: How F1 driver Sebastian Vettel used Find My to chase thieves and track his lost AirPods
content_html: ​Vettel was in Barcelona for the Spanish Grand Prix and a day after the race was in town in his Aston Martin. The former F1 champion stopped outside a hotel when thieves stole a backpack from his car.
summary: ​Vettel was in Barcelona for the Spanish Grand Prix and a day after the race was in town in his Aston Martin. The former F1 champion stopped outside a hotel when thieves stole a backpack from his car.

title: Sharp announces new range of multifunctional printers at a starting price of Rs 81,884
Oppo Enco R true wireless earbuds with 13.4mm drivers, water-resistant design launched
content_html: Oppo launched its latest Reno 8 series of smartphones at an event in China. Along with the new smartphone series, the company has also launched its latest pair of true wireless earbuds -- Oppo Enco R. The true wireless earbuds come with Bluetooth 5.2 support and 13.4mm dynamic driver unit. The device also promises to offer 20 hours of total battery backup.
summary: Oppo launched its latest Reno 8 series of smartphones at an event in China. Along with the new smartphone series, the company has also launched its latest pair of true wireless earbuds -- Oppo Enco R. The true wireless earbuds come with Bluetooth 5.2 support and 13.4mm dynamic driver unit. The device also promises to offer 20 hours of total battery backup.

title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 users in India will have to wait for this much-wanted feature
content_html: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 finally received the much-awaited feature. Samsung launched the Galaxy Watch 4 last year in August. Since the launch of the wearable its users have been waiting for the Google Assistant support. At the time of the launch, the smartwatch came with only Bixby support.
summary: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 finally received the much-awaited feature. Samsung launched the Galaxy Watch 4 last year in August. Since the launch of the wearable its users have been waiting for the Google Assistant support. At the time of the launch, the smartwatch came with only Bixby support.

title: Xiaomi TV ES Pro 86-inch with Dolby Vision launched in China
content_html: Xiaomi has brought a new television – the Xiaomi TV ES Pro 86-inch – to China. The Xiaomi TV ES Pro comes as the latest premium offering from Xiaomi in the television segment. The TV ES Pro 86-inch price in China is CNY 8,499 (Rs 98,400). Xiaomi is currently taking pre-orders for the TV in China, and the open sale is set to begin on May 31. There is no word if the Xiaomi TV ES Pro 86-inch would be available outside China or not.
summary: Xiaomi has brought a new television – the Xiaomi TV ES Pro 86-inch – to China. The Xiaomi TV ES Pro comes as the latest premium offering from Xiaomi in the television segment. The TV ES Pro 86-inch price in China is CNY 8,499 (Rs 98,400). Xiaomi is currently taking pre-orders for the TV in China, and the open sale is set to begin on May 31. There is no word if the Xiaomi TV ES Pro 86-inch would be available outside China or not.

title: Google Play Store web redesign now rolling out, here's what has changed
content_html: Google is finally rolling out a massive redesign to the Play Store web. The company started testing the new web user interface redesign in November last year. The updated UI design of the Play Store web brings it in line with other Google services and apps.
summary: Google is finally rolling out a massive redesign to the Play Store web. The company started testing the new web user interface redesign in November last year. The updated UI design of the Play Store web brings it in line with other Google services and apps.

title: Dreamotion announces pre-registration for Road to Valor Empires on App Store and Play Store
content_html: Road to Valor: Empires is the sequel to Road to Valor: World War II. The previous game boasts more than 3 million downloads since its launch in 2019. Players in this game can design their own armies from different civilisations and myths and can become field generals of those units.
summary: Road to Valor: Empires is the sequel to Road to Valor: World War II. The previous game boasts more than 3 million downloads since its launch in 2019. Players in this game can design their own armies from different civilisations and myths and can become field generals of those units.

title: Realme Pad X specifications confirmed ahead of official announcement
content_html: Realme is set to announce its next tablet – the Pad X – in China on May 26. The upcoming tablet will be succeeding the Realme Pad and Pad Mini. The announcement for Realme Pad X is scheduled for May 26 at 2 PM local time (11:30 AM IST).
summary: Realme is set to announce its next tablet – the Pad X – in China on May 26. The upcoming tablet will be succeeding the Realme Pad and Pad Mini. The announcement for Realme Pad X is scheduled for May 26 at 2 PM local time (11:30 AM IST).

title: Oppo Reno 8 series of smartphones with 50MP main camera, Android 12 launched
content_html: Oppo has finally unveiled its much-teased Reno 8 series of smartphones in China. The Oppo Reno 8 series consist of three smartphones -- Oppo Reno 8, Reno 8 Pro and Reno 8 Pro+. All the three smartphones have AMOLED screens and 50MP main cameras. The Pro versions of the smartphones offer some advanced camera features and Oppo's Mari X Silicon NPU
summary: Oppo has finally unveiled its much-teased Reno 8 series of smartphones in China. The Oppo Reno 8 series consist of three smartphones -- Oppo Reno 8, Reno 8 Pro and Reno 8 Pro+. All the three smartphones have AMOLED screens and 50MP main cameras. The Pro versions of the smartphones offer some advanced camera features and Oppo's Mari X Silicon NPU

title: Pixel Watch to come in an LTE version, said to be powered by Cortex-M33 co-processor
content_html: Google’s first in-house smartwatch – the Pixel Watch – will arrive later this year. The Pixel Watch has already been seen in the wild and has been doing enough rounds on the internet for some time. Now, the Pixel Watch has surfaced on the certification site FCC, and the listing suggests that the upcoming smartwatch will come in three different variants.
summary: Google’s first in-house smartwatch – the Pixel Watch – will arrive later this year. The Pixel Watch has already been seen in the wild and has been doing enough rounds on the internet for some time. Now, the Pixel Watch has surfaced on the certification site FCC, and the listing suggests that the upcoming smartwatch will come in three different variants.

title: Realme Narzo 50 5G sale starts in India today: Specifications, price, availability
content_html: The Narzo 50 5G features a 6.5-inch FHD+ 90Hz display, Dimensity 810 SoC, 5000mAh battery and more. Here is everything you need to know about the Realme Naro 50 5G.
